infotexts.entitydescription.he-proteinbar1: A somewhat tasty protein bar. Helps to speed up the healing process a bit.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-chips1: Dried pomegrenade chips. A popular little snack to watch the annual 'DUNWICE FACE-OFF' to.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-chips2: Dried mutated pomegrenade chips. A popular little snack. It is said to speed up the healing of burns a bit.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-burgerbun: Used in the making of burgers.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-breadslices: Two slices of bread. Great for making sandwiches!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-sandwichbbjam: A tasty sandwich with bubble berry jam.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedcrawlerfilet: The taste is awful, but that's not unusual on Europa.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedhumanfilet: Tastes like pork, a little bit more bitter, stronger.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-humanburger: Has a slight bitter taste to it.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-humanhotdog: Has a slight bitter taste to it.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-hammerheadburger: Mhhh it's so tasty, you'd like to smash your head in disbelief!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-hammerheadhotdog: Mhhh it's so tasty, you'd like to smash your head in disbelief!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedhammerheadspa: A delicious meal with a strong taste.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedthresherfilet: It's flabby and a bit slimey.
infotexts.entitydescription.popnut: Kids love to play with them. Needs to be put in water to pop it open and be able to consume it.
infotexts.entitydescription.popnutpopped: It's popped open, ready to be consumed. Used in some recipes.
infotexts.entitydescription.badpopnutpopped: It's popped open, ready to be consumed. Used in some recipes. Might be dangerous to leave it in the water.
infotexts.entitydescription.bubbleberryvineseed: Plant it in a planter to grow bubble berries.
infotexts.entitydescription.popnutvineseed: Plant it in a planter to grow pop nuts.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-energydrink1: A refreshing energy drink. Good for when you're absolutely shit-faced and need to sober up a bit.
infotexts.entitydescription.rum: A strong alcoholic beverage. |Alcoholic Beverage |Decrease Psychosis |Decrease Hallucinations |Decrease Husk Infection (If below 90%) |Heal Damage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rum: A very strong rum enriched with uranium for extra spice. |Alcoholic Beverage |Decrease Psychosis |Decrease Hallucinations |Decrease Husk Infection (If below 90%) |Healing Properties |Increase Psychosis Resistance |Increase Radiation Sickness (Slightly)
infotexts.entitydescription.he-whiskey: Doctor Michael's original whiskey. Approved by Doctors europa-wide. |Alcoholic Beverage |Reduce Hallucinations |Reduce Effects of Halucinova |Reduce Chem Addiction |Increase Psychosis Resistance |Slight Healing Properties
infotexts.entitydescription.he-halucinova: Keep away from "Sadashi Kira" at all cost! |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Hallucinations | Slight Healing Properties
infotexts.entitydescription.he-beer: A popular beer amongst coalition station inhabitants. |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.he-milk: A bottle of Moloch Milk. Tastes a bit funny. Don't ask how they get milk from a Moloch! May help a bit when you're shit-faced or hungry.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-beercoalitionpremiu: A popular beer amongst coalition station inhabitants. |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.he-beerjovianforce: A beer most popular amongst the Separatists. |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.he-beerliquidascension: A popular beer amongst members of the church of husk on their way to ascension! |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance |Increase Pressure Immunity |Oxygen Not Included |May contain traces of husk parasites
infotexts.entitydescription.he-beerclownjuice: A popular beer amongst pranksters. Praise the honkmother! |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.he-beerreaperstribute: A strong beer to pay tribute to the reaper. |Alcoholic Beverage |Clear Reaper's Tax |Increase Psychosis Resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegempty: An empty keg used for some recipes. Can be used in water to collect dirty water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegseawater: A keg full of sea water. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station. Can be cooked into clean water at a stove or brewing kettle. Also used in hydroponic planters.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegwater: A keg full of water. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegcoalitionpremium: A keg full of Coalition Premium beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegjovianforce: A keg full of Jovian Force beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegliquidascension: A keg full of Liquid Ascension beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegclownjuice: A keg full of Clown Juice beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegreaperstribute: A keg full of Reaper's Tribute beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegrum: A keg full of rum. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegpiraterum: A keg full of pirate rum. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegwhiskey: A keg full of whiskey. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-keghalucinova: A keg full of halucinova. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottle: A blueprint of a regular bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottlebeer: A blueprint of a beer bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottlerum: A blueprint of a rum bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottlewhis: A blueprint of a Whiskey bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottlehalu: A blueprint of a Halucinova bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintjar: A blueprint of a Jar. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintshaker: A blueprint of a Shaker. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottlerum: An empty Rum bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottlewhiskey: An empty Whiskey bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottlehalucino: An empty Halucinova bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottlebeer: An empty beer bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottle: An empty bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptyjar: An empty jar used for some recipes. Can be thrown.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptyshaker: An empty shaker ready to be filled with salt!.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-endwormmeatchunk: A fat chunk of meat from an Endworm. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawendwormmeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawendwormsausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawendwormmeatpatty: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-humanmeatchunk: Parts of a human. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhumanmeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhumansausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhumanmeatpatty: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-crawlermeatchunk: A Crawler cut in half. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawcrawlermeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawcrawlersausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawcrawlermeatpatty: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-mudraptormeatchunk: A nice chunk of meat cut from a Mudraptor. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmudraptormeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmudraptorsausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmudraptormeatpat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmudraptorroast: Time to put it in the oven! Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-hammerheadmeatchunk: A nice chunk of meat cut from a Hammerhead. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadmeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadsausag: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadmeatpa: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadsparer: Cut from a massive ripcage. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadroast: Time to put it in the oven. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-hammerheadspawnmeat: A Hammerhead baby. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-threshermeatchunk: A piece of meat cut from a Thresher. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawthreshermeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawthreshersausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawthreshermeatpatt: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookingoil: This one is not used in engines.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-glassfragments: Shattered glass. Can be obtained through smashing bottles or crafting them from quartz at a fabricator. Used for crafting at a fabricator or bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-jambubbleberry: Tasty jam made out of bubble berries. Known to quench a bit of thirst.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-enableneeds: [RMB+E] Enables the hunger and thirst afflictions for the user, causing them to have to eat and drink regularly. This is completely optional and is NOT required to gain buffs from eating or drinking. Warning: Can't be disabled for your current character once it is enabled. DO NOT USE WHEN PLAYING WITH 'NEEDS' BY 'LeDoux'!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cleaver:
Time is up! Chop chop!

Can chop up:
-Crawlers
-Mudraptors
-Threshers
-Hammerheads
-Hammerhead Spawns
-Endworms
-Humans
infotexts.entitydescription.he-skillbooktheeuropan: "... Peek behind the curtain of time. Is that you, Robert? No, I am Robert. But I am also Doris. I am the meat. Eat of me and become one with the Worm. ..."
infotexts.entityname.he-skillbookauntdoris: THE ART OF DEEP SEA COOKING by Aunt Doris
infotexts.entitydescription.he-genesaw: Can extract a random gene from a corpse.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-antistarve: Used to wake up a patient that lost conciousness due to starvation or thirst.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-chefscap1: Show them whose kitchen this is!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-chefscap2: Show them whose kitchen this is!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-chefsuniform1: Worn by chefs all across europa!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-chefsuniform2: Worn by chefs all across europa!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kitchencounter: Can store up to 18 different small or medium items and refill empty bottles and kegs with sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kitchencounter2: Can store up to 30 different small or medium items.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-refrigerator: Prevents spoilage. Can only store food and drinks. Needs power.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-fryer: Used for frying stuff. Needs power.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-distiller: Used to distill ethanol from sugar and sea yeast shrooms. Needs power.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-brewkettle: Used to brew kegs of almost any kind of beverage. Needs power.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-bottleprinter: Used to mass produce bottles. Needs power.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-refillstation: Used to refill empty bottles from a keg.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-coolercrate: Used to prevent meat from spoiling. Needs a battery.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-liquorcrate: Used to store and transport up to 20 bottles of any kind.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-jarcrate: Used to store and transport up to 8 jars.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-liquorcrateshelf: A shelf to store up to 4 of your liquor and jar crates.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-liquorcrateshelfsma: A small shelf to store up to 2 of your liquor and jar crates.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-liquordisplayshelf: A shelf to display and store your bottles. Jars don't fit.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-toolbeltlunch: A Tool Belt with a Lunch Box attached to it to always carry your food with you.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-lunchbox: It's a box with a handle to carry your food around. Can be attached to a toolbelt at a fabricator.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-hydroponicplanter: A device providing perfect conditions for europas underwater plants to grow. Yields a plant every 15 minutes. Needs power.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cafeteriacart: Used to transport a lot of food and drinks around and or store it in a more accessible area for the crew. Holds up to 30 different foods or drinks. Can be placed.
infotexts.jobdescription.he-chef: The chef is responsible for butchering creatures and preparing meals to eat for the crew to ensure that everyone is saturated and happy.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-hungryeuropan: You're a hungry europan and need to eat and drink regularly.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-poacher: Gain an additional [xpbonus]% bonus XP in [missiontype1] and [missiontype2] missions.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-saltybusiness: The first time you open a container, you have a chance of [probability]% to find some extra salt in it.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-fastfood: Increase the speed of kitchen related fabricators by [amount]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-chefattire: Unlock the crafting recipes for [itemname1] and [itemname2].
infotexts.talentdescription.he-frenzy: Increase your attack strength with butcher related knives by [powerincrease]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-butchershop: You're a talented butcher and it shows!\nGet [amount]% more money when selling meat!
infotexts.talentdescription.he-coldblood: You're the coolest person around.\nMeat no longer spoils in your inventory.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-masterchef: You've become a master of your work and learned how to save some ingredients for later when cooking.\nYou have a [chance]% chance to not consume a random ingredient while preparing a meal.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-lifesaver: Gain a bonus of [amount] to [skill].\nUnlock the crafting recipe for [itemname1].
infotexts.talentdescription.he-delicacies: Unlock the following recipes of europan delicacies:\n[itemname1]
infotexts.talentdescription.he-masterbrewer:
Unlock the following recipes of europan beverages:
[itemname1]
[itemname2]
[itemname3]
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-hunger.other.lo: The patient is starting to get a small appetite.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-hunger.lethal.o: The patient is starting to starve.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-thirst.other.lo: The patient is starting to get thirsty.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-thirst.lethal.o: The patient is starting to die of thirst.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-dieofthirst.oth: The patient is dying of thirst.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-cannibalskillin: All your skills are increased by 20%
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-alcoholism: The patient is happy enough... so long as they get what they need.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-al: It's time for a booze cruise! You're addicted to alcohol.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-alcoholwithdraw: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, as are the signs of nausea.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-alcoholwit: You have died of alcohol withdrawal.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-al: You have the feeling it's time to open up another cold one with the boys!
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient shows light signs of alcohol withdrawal.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-al: A cold beer or a bottle of rum... Anything to quench this horrible thirst for alcohol!
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient shows heavy signs of alcohol withdrawal.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-cannibalism: The patient is happy enough... so long as they get what they need.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-ca: Uh oh! Seems like you like the taste of your fellow crewmates.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The patient certainly likes a special type of meat.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-hungryforhumanm: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, the eyes stare empty.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.he-hungryforhuman: Lost their mind over human meat.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-hungryforh: You lost your mind over human meat.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-hu: Your crewmates are starting to look quite tasty!
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient gives you a cold stare.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-hu: Your struggling to focus on anything. You crave for human flesh. You want to murder. Your arms grow stronger just by thinking about it.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient gives you a cold stare and is severly twitching.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-drunkinvertcont: Up is down and left is... right? Where am I?
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-stuffed: You have choked on your own vomit.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-st: The stomach is at its limit. Eating more might cause you to vomit.
The stomach is too full. You feel the need to vomit.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The stomach is full. The patient had enough to eat.
The stomach is very full. The patient had almost too much to eat.
The stomach is too full. The patient might vomit.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-stomachach: You have choked on your own vomit.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-st: The stomach hurts and you feel slightly nauseous.
The stomach hurts a lot and you're feeling very nauseous.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The patient's stomach hurts from drinking too much sea water.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-butchered: The corpse is being butchered for meat.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-halucinova.self: You feel like traveling to a different plane of existence.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-halucinova.othe: The person is clearly zoning out.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.regular: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT REGULAR BOTTLES.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.beer: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT BEER BOTTLES.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.rum: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT RUM BOTTLES.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.whiskey: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT WHISKEY BOTTLES.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.halucinova: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT HALUCINOVA BOTTLES.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.jar: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT JARS.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.shaker: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT SHAKERS.
infotexts.bottleprinter.missingitem.blueprint: MATERIAL INSERTED\nERROR: NO BLUEPRINT FOUND! PLEASE INSERT A BLUEPRINT.
infotexts.bottleprinter.missingitem.glassfragments: BLUEPRINT INSERTED\nERROR: NO GLASS FRAGMENTS FOUND! PLEASE INSERT GLASS FRAGMENTS.
infotexts.bottleprinter.empty:
BOTTLE PRINTER READY
PLEASE INSERT THE FOLLOWING:
A MATERIAL -INTO- INPUT
A BLUEPRINT -INTO- INPUT
A SUITABLE CRATE -INTO- OUTPUT
infotexts.distiller.empty:
DISTILLER READY
PLEASE INSERT THE FOLLOWING:
A PACK OF SUGAR -INTO- INPUT
A YEAST SHROOM -INTO- INPUT
infotexts.distiller.missingitem.yeastshroom: SUGAR INSERTED\nERROR: NO YEAST SHROOM FOUND! PLEASE INSERT A YEASTSHROOM.
